text: Musa nakawalonjela Aluni na wana wa heye, “Mtogose lila iwunde hali lwizi lwa ihema lya Nguluwi, mulye baho hamwe na ibumunda kulawa kuli likowe liwele na nhambiko ya kuwichigwa kwa mijito yelile. Mdite kota vyondajizwe na Mkulu Nguluwi, nakalonga, ‘Honhu aho holika na Aluni na wana wa heye.’
